urls.title: Is It Time for a Different Approach to Flooding?
urls.description: With all the rain that has fallen, it‚Äôs not surprising that over 400 flood warnings were issued throughout England last week. Within this context, a new study has been developed by North Yorkshire County Council and City of York Council which focuses on tackling flooding by working in partnership with upland landowners to allow their land to flood, thereby storing rainfall runoff and protecting properties in towns and villages downstream from flooding. Such schemes are often referred to as Natural Flood
